title: San Diego/Balboa Park-Hillcrest
name: Spruce Street Bridge
address: in south Hillcrest at the end of Spruce Street, west of First Avenue
content: Something of a neighborhood secret, this steel-cable suspension footbridge dates back to the 1910's, and connects to a nearby residential neighborhood. There's not a whole lot to it really, but it is very scenic as you walk right through the treetops on the sides of the canyon.
